snippet.title: Company of Heroes 3 - Official Features Trailer | gamescom 2022
snippet.description: In the new Gamescom 2022 trailer, Company of Heroes 3 reveals itself to possibly be the most intricate WW2 RTS ever made. With all the new systems and features including tactical pausing, height advantages, and brand-new mission types, this is shaping up to be an RTS you don't want to miss.
